body:
So... My name is Robin. I´m a random guy from sweden, 13 years old. I thought I would give this community a try doe my own is closing.. 

As I said my name is Robin, 13 years old and live in sweden, on my freetime i like to play floorball and just chill with a game. My top 3 games is Mc, mario and pokémon! 

My friend Adrianosborne, or Adam already joined this community and it seems to work fine for him, he is probably the reason I joined this server and played..

I´m also an old Overcast player, even tho I will keep playing there it is always fun to have a coomunity to talk to, because I'm not really into the Overcast community.

( And I´ve been rude to players before, like months ago, sorry if you are any of those, I can go overline sometimes :( .... ) 

Well, that´s it! If there is anything you think I should know, please wrote down there :)
